item.title: 7 people missing after tourist sailboat sinks in storm off Sicily
Indian-American doctor didn't hear patient’s painful cries during colonoscopy due to missing hearing aids
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Canadian hiker missing in Colorado wilderness, rescued after 4 days
item.description: A hiker from Canada who went missing after leaving a spiritual retreat was found safe four days later in southwest Colorado. The rescue operation highlighted the importance of proper preparation, including carrying communication technology. The event was part of Animas Valley Institute's program, aimed at nature immersion, which has operated since 1980 without incidents before this event.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Mississippi police officer gets wrong number text: ‘Bruh, we smoke all the time’, cops reply goes viral
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Israel-Gaza ceasefire negotiations: Where does it stand?
item.description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken returned to Israel for his 15th visit to meet Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu amid rising regional tensions following targeted killings of senior Hamas and Hezbollah leaders. Negotiations for a ceasefire and hostage release in the Gaza conflict show slow progress despite cautious optimism. A potential ceasefire promises regional stability and humanitarian relief.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Republican Barbara Comstock endorses Kamala Harris for President
item.description: Former Republican congresswoman Barbara Comstock endorsed Kamala Harris’s presidential bid, citing Donald Trump's refusal to acknowledge his loss and threats to democracy. Comstock joined former congressman Denver Riggleman in supporting Harris, while Virginia's GOP establishment remains loyal to Trump. Comstock served Virginia's 10th Congressional District and often clashed with Trump during her tenure.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: US elections: Protests loom large as Democratic National Convention kicks off in Chicago
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Biden to pass torch to Harris in bittersweet convention farewell
item.description: US President Joe Biden will deliver a farewell address at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago, passing the torch to Kamala Harris as the party's nominee. Biden praised Harris as the best candidate to continue his efforts in protecting American democracy. Biden's departure is marked by both celebration and protests against his administration's policies.

item.title: 'Is she drunk?': Kamala Harris' viral videos fuel ‘intoxication’ claims at election rallies
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Watch: Markle's Spanish speech steals the show at Afro-Colombian event
item.description: Meghan Markle delivered a heartfelt speech in Spanish at Cali’s Municipal Theatre, supporting Afro-Colombian women. She emphasized the importance of young girls and women being heard, aligning this with her Archewell Foundation's mission. The event concluded with a fashion show featuring local designers, and the couple attended a festival celebrating Afro-Colombian culture.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Pro-Palestine protester disrupts DNC delegate party at Navy Pier
item.description: A pro-Palestine protester disrupted the Democratic National Convention delegate party at Navy Pier in Chicago, accusing the Harris administration of funding Israel. This incident followed calls for mobilization and is part of broader demonstrations expected during the convention, with 100,000 protesters anticipated in the city.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Thunderstorms in US: NYC to DC faces wind, hail, and flooding
item.description: Severe thunderstorms hit the Northeast and mid-Atlantic regions on August 18, 2024, with destructive wind gusts, hail, and flash flooding affecting major cities like New York, Philadelphia, and Washington, DC. The storms caused travel disruptions, power outages, and evacuations, notably affecting Amtrak services and leading to a gas leak in Danbury, Connecticut.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Astrology and 2024 US elections: How Trump's Gemini and Harris' Libra shape voter perceptions
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Gaza faces rising Polio outbreak risk amid war, aid groups push for ceasefire
item.description: The Gaza Strip faced a growing polio threat, with aid organizations calling for a pause in the ongoing conflict for vaccination efforts. A confirmed case and several suspected cases have emerged, with the virus detected in wastewater. Humanitarian groups emphasize the need for a ceasefire to vaccinate over 600,000 children and prevent an outbreak.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: DNC 2024: Harris, Walz set to accept nominations- All you need to know
item.description: The Democratic National Convention in Chicago will see Kamala Harris and Tim Walz nominated for the 2024 Presidential race. Key speakers, including Joe Biden and Michelle Obama, will address the attendees. The convention aims to galvanize support in battleground states, with Harris focusing on future-focused themes and the Democratic platform emphasizing progressive values.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk
